/>
Introduction
This topic includes information about general principles for assigning effective dates, including
gathering evidence for effective date determinations
general effective date rule
definition of date entitlement arose
determining
the applicable date of claim for effective date purposes
, and
whether date of claim or date entitlement arose is later
effective date
of entitlement versus effective date of payment
, and
associated with sympathetic reading or a within-scope determination
impact of
Public Law (PL) 112-154,
Section 506, on fully developed claim (FDC) effective dates
, and
maximizing benefits with effective date determinations
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A - Effective Dates
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A
